stanza.line: O how I faint when I of you do (a)write(/a)
Knowing a better spirit doth use your (b)name(/b)
And in the praise thereof spends all his (a)might(/a)
To make me tongue-tied speaking of your (b)fame(/b)
But since your worth (wide as the ocean (c)is)(/c)
The humble as the proudest sail doth (d)bear(/d)
On your broad main doth wilfully (d)appear(/d)
Your shallowest help will hold me up (e)afloat(/e)
Whilst he upon your soundless deep doth (f)ride(/f)
Or (being wrecked) I am a worthless (e)boat(/e)
He of tall building and of goodly (f)pride(/f)
Then if he thrive and I be cast (g)away(/g)
The worst was this my love was my (g)decay(/g)
